description: Fixed version with reentrancy guard and market registration validation
root_cause: Functions accept any market address without validation and make external calls without reentrancy protection. Attacker can deploy fake market that reenters during claimRewards call.

transformation.fix_description: Added registeredMarkets mapping, _locked bool for reentrancy guard, nonReentrant modifier applied to all functions, require check that market is registered before operations.

exact_changes.version_a:
mapping(address => bool) public registeredMarkets;
bool private _locked;
exact_changes.version_b: // No market registry or reentrancy lock

exact_changes.version_a: modifier nonReentrant() { require(!_locked, "Reentrant call"); _locked = true; _; _locked = false; }
function deposit(...) external nonReentrant { require(registeredMarkets[market], "Market not registered"); ... }

transformation.why_fix_works: Reentrancy guard prevents recursive calls during external interactions, and market registration ensures only legitimate Pendle markets can be used.
